summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the supplemental assessment or reassessment, and supplemental or reassessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2482 for the improvement of Twenty-third Avenue West and Twenty-third Avenue West Produced from the intersection of West Garfield Street to West Newton Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a bridge roadway thereon Twenty-six (26) feet in width, and by doping such grading as may be necessary, under Ordinance No. 26851, under Ordinance No. 33770, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
